name: bet the farm
description:
https://github.com/Error-407/BetTheFarm

Explanation of the game: 

In this game you will have to try to survive in a strange world that is built from different clichés and by connecting them a farm has been created. 

You will have to survive for 100 days, you will have to manage and organize the farm and try as much as possible not to die. 

There are only two ways to die.

Don't get too tired, it's instant death

Don't get to the point you have too low health, it's instant death

I'm in an exam period and I didn't have much time to create everything,  so there may be problems or something unclear (sorry) but I wanted to participatein this in a fun way and on the way to learn, so if there's a problem I'd love to know

Thank you and I hope you enjoy
